ygData.subject: Fwd: Basic Policy
ygData.msgSnippet: Got this from Verant.. after the initial eqmail@verant.com or whatever guy said they couldnt help me.. he offered the email to his supervisor
ygData.messageBody:
Got this from Verant.. after the initial eqmail@... or whatever guy
said they couldnt help me.. he offered the email to his supervisor <which in
this case is a GM on Tunare> so I took him up on his offer :)


In a message dated 09/11/1999 2:06:26 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
tterrazas@... writes:

<< Basically, the guides should not tell you that there is nothing that we can
do unless the other party has left the game. If he has left the area, we
can still send them a message. Good luck to you and we will see you in
game.

Regards,
Thom Terrazas / Aikbach >>
